testsuite.name: Scenario: Create a new question with a theme

testcase.name: Given I am logged in as the default administrator
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new question with a theme

testcase.name: And I am on the Content Repository page of Demonstration Class
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new question with a theme

testcase.name: And I choose creating new question/Text from the main dropdown button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new question with a theme

testcase.name: And Question Designer is opened
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new question with a theme

testcase.name: When I enter valid information for the question name as "Theme Question"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new question with a theme

testcase.name: And I expand the "Custom CSS" section
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new question with a theme

testcase.name: And I click Theme
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new question with a theme

testcase.name: Then I see the Choose Theme dialog
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new question with a theme

testcase.name: When I drag the "Jellybean" theme to the Applied Themes column
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new question with a theme

testcase.name: And I click Apply
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new question with a theme

testcase.name: Then I see the theme applied to the question editor
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new question with a theme

testcase.name: When I click the Preview button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new question with a theme

testcase.name: Then I see the theme applied to the Question Preview page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new question with a theme

testcase.name: Then I close the question preview window
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new question with a theme

testcase.name: Then I click the question designer Save & Close button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new question with a theme

testcase.name: Then I see that I am on the Content Repository page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new question with a theme
